CustomField.formula: IF( Name = "Directors & Officers", "Directors & Officers", IF( Name = "D&O", "Directors & Officers", IF( Name = "Excess D&O", "Excess Directors & Officers", IF( Name = "EPL", "Employment Practices Liability Insurance", IF( Name = "Excess EPL", "Excess Employment Practices Liability Insurance", IF( Name = "Excess FID", "Excess Fiduciary Liability", IF( Name = "Fiduciary Liability", "Fiduciary Liability", IF( Name = "FID", "Fiduciary Liability", IF( Name = "Employment Practices Liability Insurance", "Employment Practices Liability Insurance", IF( Name = "Key Man", "Accident & Health", IF( Name = "FMP M&PL", "Management & Professional Liability", IF( Name = "FMP EPL", "Employment Practices Liability Insurance", IF( Name = "FMP FID", "Fiduciary Liability","" )))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Class of Business
